title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Aircraft Transaction
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Aircraft Transaction 

Register Survey) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order shall cease to have effect on 1 February 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (aircraft transaction register survey) order 2020 (2) order shall cease effect 1 february 2025

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“aircraft” means aeroplanes and other powered aircraft, excluding helicopters 
and dirigibles, of an unladen weight exceeding 2,000 kg, where “unladen 
weight” means the weight of the machine in normal flying order, excluding the 
weight of the crew and of fuel and equipment other than permanently fitted 
items of equipment; 

“Regulations” means Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1982/2004 of 18 
November 20041, as amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1915/2005 
of 24 November 20052, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 91/2010 of 2 
February 20103, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 96/2010 of 4 February 
20104, Commission Regulation (EU) No. 1093/2013 of 4 November 20135, and 
corrected by Corrigendum to Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1982/2004 of 
18 November 20046, and Commission Regulation (EU) No. 113/2010 of 9 

1 OJ L 343, 19.11.2004, p. 3. 
2 OJ L 307, 25.11.2005, p. 8. 
3 OJ L 31, 3.2.2010, p. 1. 
4 OJ L 34, 5.2.2010, p. 1. 
5 OJ L 294, 6.11.2013, p. 28. 
6 OJ L 368, 15.12.2004, p. 54. 
7 OJ L 37, 10.2.2010, p. 1. 
8 OJ L 329, 3.12.2016, p. 66. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [582] 3 

February 20107, as amended by Commission Regulation (EU) 2016/2119 of 2 
December 20168; 

“survey” means the Aircraft Transaction Register Survey that is conducted by 
the Central Statistics Office in order to obtain information set out in Part 2 of 
the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulations. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulations has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulations, except 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person – 

(a) 

(b) 

engaged in, or 

acting on behalf of a person engaged in, 

any transaction specified in Part 1 of the Schedule.
text_norm: 3 order applies person - (a) (b) engaged acting behalf person engaged transaction specified part 1 schedule

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 4. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this
text_raw:
4. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this 
Order applies where, in the period of 24 months immediately preceding that 
date, on any day in that period, the person engaged in the purchase or sale of 
aircraft. 

(2) A requirement on persons to whom this Article applies – 

(a) 

(b) 

subject to paragraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
Part 2 of the Schedule in relation to each month in the period 
from 1 January 2021 to 31 December 2024, and 
to provide the information in relation to each month in the 
period referred to in paragraph (a), once only, 

is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [582]
text_norm: 4 (1) article applies particular date person order applies period 24 month immediately preceding date day period person engaged purchase sale aircraft (2) requirement person article applies - (a) (b) subject paragraph (b) provide purpose survey information general nature specified part 2 schedule relation month period 1 january 2021 31 december 2024 provide information relation month period referred paragraph (a) hereby prescribed 4 582

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: Article 3
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Article 3 

Transactions to which Article 3 refers: 

(a) 

lease of aircraft; 

(b) purchase of aircraft; 

(c) 

sale of aircraft. 

Part 2 

Article 4
